name: Arcade Game Project in Construct 3
description:
I made this little game 1 Years Ago.

To open you have to use the r150 version.

I used the Tweeen behavior.

I want to do it again in the next few months, but for now I decide to release this version.

Assets: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/western-fps-1-5288/

If you want learn how to create videogames (in italian): https://svilupparegiochi.it/

PS: Send me a version without bug!!! You have to fix them!!!
